thread.title: VERBATIM: Pentagon touts success of Syrian airstrikes

title: VERBATIM: Pentagon touts success of Syrian airstrikes
text:
VERBATIM: Pentagon touts success of Syrian airstrikes Saturday, April 14, 2018 - 01:23 
The Pentagon said on Saturday that U.S. strikes in Syria overnight had successfully hit every target and were aimed to deliver an unambiguous signal to the Syrian government and deter the future use of chemical weapons.   
The Pentagon said on Saturday that U.S. strikes in Syria overnight had successfully hit every target and were aimed to deliver an unambiguous signal to the Syrian government and deter the future use of chemical weapons.  //reut.rs/2ITP81p
